data.title: About Adobe Systems Incorporated (Software Company)
data.meta_description: Adobe Systems Incorporated, popularly known as Adobe was founded by Charles Geschke and John Warnock in 1982. The software company is headquartered in San Jose, California, U.S.; it focuses on the production and supply of multimedia and creativity software products such as Photoshop and Acrobat Reader. The name Adobe Systems Incorporated was later changed to Adobe Inc.
data.text:
Adobe Systems Incorporated

About The Developer

Adobe Systems Incorporated, popularly known as Adobe was founded by Charles Geschke and John Warnock in 1982. The software company is headquartered in San Jose, California, U.S.; it focuses on the production and supply of multimedia and creativity software products such as Photoshop and Acrobat Reader. The name Adobe Systems Incorporated was later changed to Adobe Inc.

Development Operating Systems: Windows, Web, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android, Solaris, Unix, OS X El Capitan
